unnormalised: Okay, people, grab your chai and settle in, 'cause we're diving deep into the latest Bollywood buzz!
normalised: Okay, people, grab your chai and settle in, because we are diving deep into the latest Bollywood buzz!

unnormalised: First up, whispers are circulating around the grapevine like rumours about the authenticity of Katrina Kaif's mehndi designs. Sources close to Karan Johar (yeah, the guy practically running Dharma Productions) are saying that Ranbir Kapoor and Alia Bhatt are planning a second, bigger, more extravagant wedding reception. Remember the low-key thing they had last year? Apparently, that was just for close family. This one’s gonna be full-blown, Bollywood Dhamaka! Expect every single star from Anupam Kher to Zareen Khan to be fighting for a selfie.
normalised: First up, whispers are circulating around the grapevine like rumors about the authenticity of Katrina Kaif's mehndi designs. Sources close to Karan Johar (yeah, the guy practically running Dharma Productions) are saying that Ranbir Kapoor and Alia Bhatt are planning a second, bigger, more extravagant wedding reception. Remember the low-key thing they had last year? Apparently, that was just for close family. This one is going to be full-blown, Bollywood Dhamaka! Expect every single star from Anupam Kher to Zareen Khan to be fighting for a selfie.

unnormalised: Then there's the scoop on Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas's recent trip to Jaipur. Paparazzi caught them strolling through City Palace looking ridiculously happy. Theories abound – is it a belated honeymoon redo? A potential real estate investment (they probably have enough Rs. to buy the entire city)? Or maybe they're just really into Rajasthani handicrafts? Your guess is as good as mine!
normalised: Then there is the scoop on Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas's recent trip to Jaipur. Paparazzi caught them strolling through City Palace looking ridiculously happy. Theories abound – is it a belated honeymoon redo? A potential real estate investment (they probably have enough rupees to buy the entire city)? Or maybe they are just really into Rajasthani handicrafts? Your guess is as good as mine!

unnormalised: Speaking of Rajasthan, sources are saying that Deepika Padukone turned down a 10 Crore endorsement deal with a famous paan masala brand. Good for her! Seems even Bollywood queens have standards these days.
normalised: Speaking of Rajasthan, sources are saying that Deepika Padukone turned down a ten crore endorsement deal with a famous paan masala brand. Good for her! Seems even Bollywood queens have standards these days.

unnormalised: And finally, did you hear about the HUGE fight between Kangana Ranaut and… well, someone else? Honestly, are we even surprised anymore? This time, it's allegedly over a role in a new Sanjay Leela Bhansali film. Apparently, both actresses thought they were a shoo-in for the part of the tragic heroine. Sounds like another episode of 'Koffee with Karan' material, if you ask me.
normalised: And finally, did you hear about the huge fight between Kangana Ranaut and… well, someone else? Honestly, are we even surprised anymore? This time, it is allegedly over a role in a new Sanjay Leela Bhansali film. Apparently, both actresses thought they were a shoe-in for the part of the tragic heroine. Sounds like another episode of 'Koffee with Karan' material, if you ask me.

unnormalised: Stay tuned for more gossip, lovelies! And don't forget to follow me for all the latest updates on your favourite Bollywood stars. Till then, keep the chai brewing and the rumours flowing! Namaste! I heard someone saw Salman Khan cycling near Bandra too... must be for the Bharat 2 shooting schedule, right?
